metadata.title: USN-7014-2 -- nginx vulnerability
metadata.description: USN-7014-1 fixed a vulnerability in nginx. This update provides the corresponding updates for Ubuntu 16.04 LTS and Ubuntu 18.04 LTS.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that the nginx ngx_http_mp4 module incorrectly handled  certain malformed mp4 files. In environments where the mp4 directive is in  use, a remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause nginx to  crash, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7014-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libnginx-mod-http-auth-pam - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1 libnginx-mod-http-cache-purge - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1 libnginx-mod-http-dav-ext - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1 libnginx-mod-http-echo - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1 libnginx-mod-http-fancyindex - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1 libnginx-mod-http-geoip - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1 libnginx-mod-http-headers-more-filter - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1 libnginx-mod-http-image-filter - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1 libnginx-mod-http-lua - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1 libnginx-mod-http-ndk - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1 libnginx-mod-http-perl - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1 libnginx-mod-http-subs-filter - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1 libnginx-mod-http-uploadprogress - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1 libnginx-mod-http-upstream-fair - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1 libnginx-mod-http-xslt-filter - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1 libnginx-mod-mail - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1 libnginx-mod-nchan - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1 libnginx-mod-rtmp - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1 libnginx-mod-stream - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1 nginx - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1 nginx-common - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1 nginx-core - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1 nginx-doc - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1 nginx-extras - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1 nginx-full - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1 nginx-light - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
